articles.title: Bhagyashree on Thalaivi and Prabhas 20: Big films will have to release in theatres - India Today
articles.description: Bhagyashree, who rose to fame with Salman Khan's Maine Pyar Kiya, is making a comeback with Kangana Ranaut's Thalaivi and Prabhas's film. In a chat with IndiaToday.in, she spoke at length about the two films.
articles.content: Bhagyashree made her debut in Hindi with Salman Khan's Maine Pyar Kiya in 1989. She then went on to do films in Kannada, Marathi, Telugu and Bhojpuri films. This year, the actress will be seen in two big South films - Kangana Ranaut's Thalaivi and Prabhas 20.… [+4071 chars]
